summary: An shop which sells artifacts both daedric and of Nine Divines.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][font=Arial][color=#000000][i][center]Welcome to Solitude Antiquities Shop.
Have a look at our merchandise and see description for every item.[/center]
Consdering Nine Divines we have following antiquities which are all unenchanted :[/i][/color][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]1.[/color] Julianos Black Blade[/font]
[font=Times New Roman][i]an blade made by Julianos for one of his priest in early Third era.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]2.[/color] Kyne's Tears Katana[/font]
[font=Times New Roman][i]famous katana made by magic of Kynareth.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]3.[/color] Arkay "Deathbell" Sword[/font]
[font=Times New Roman][i]an sword worn by Arkay priests during the great conflict with necromancy.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]4.[/color] Talos Messer sword[/font]
[font=Times New Roman][i]worn by one of Talos generals.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]5.[/color] Blade Of Auriel[/font]
[font=Times New Roman][i]an blade blessed by Akatosh.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]6.[/color] Zenithar Hawk sword[/font]
[font=Times New Roman][i]worn by Crusaders of Mercy.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]7.[/color] Stendarr's Guardians Longsword[/font]
[font=Times New Roman][i]worn by Knights of Nine[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]8. [/color]Marayan Crescent[/font]
[font=Times New Roman][i]an Marayan crescent blade blessed by Mara.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]9.[/color] Dibellian Crusader sword[/font]
[font=Times New Roman][i]sword blessed by Dibella.[/i][/font]

[font=Arial][color=#000000][i]Speaking of Daedric artifacts,we have following antiquities :[/i][/color][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]1.[/color] Apple Of Varmina -[i] Increases Selling Prices By 30%[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]2.[/color] Thornless Meridia - [i]You are 100% resistant to fire[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]3.[/color] Mehunes Crimson Blade -[i]Sword with paralyze at 3 sec. enchantment.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]4.[/color] Nocturnals Octagon - [i]Health stamina magicka raised by 20 pts [/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]5.[/color] Hand Of Molag Bal  - [i]Destruction and conjuration increased by 50pts.But magicka reg damaged by 10%[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]6.[/color] Azura's Moonshadow Diamond   - [i]You breath underwater[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]7. [/color]Clavicus Ville's Dusk Incenser -[i]You do 25% more damage to daedra,and you move 25& faster.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]8.[/color] Malacaths War Wreath - [i]Soul gems charge twice as more.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]9.[/color] Hermaeus Mora Apocryphic Scales - [i]Skill increase 15% faster[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]10.[/color]Brush By Boethiah - [i]Speechcraft increased by 70 pts,alchemy by 30 pts,stamina by 50 pts and stamina reg by 50%[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]11.[/color]Namira's Star Of Void - [i]Falling damage reduced to zero.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]12.[/color]Robes Of Mephala - [i]Detect Dead Constant,Fortified Speed by 30% and conjuration by 70 pts.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]13.[/color]Eagle Totem Of Hunter Hircine - [i]Magic Resistance 100% But carry capacity reduced by 100pts[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]14.[/color]Sanguins gift to Barenziah - [i]An dagger thorn of barenziah which hits have a small chance for instant kill.[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]15.[/color]Sheogorath Apple Of Oblivion - [i]Which you can replace at forge for 15 daedra hearts - also speechcraft and pickpocket increased by 50pts[/i][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#000000]16.[/color]Peryite's Shadowcaster sword - [i]Which is poisonous.[/i][/font]

[font=Arial][color=#000000][i]An of Tribunal faith we have set of Tribunal Ritual Daggers :[/i][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#000000]1.[/color][/font][/size][font=Georgia][size=3]Dagger of Almalexia - [i]Frost damage[/i]
[color=#000000]2.[/color][/size][/font][font=Georgia]Dagger Of Vivec - [i]Fire damage [/i]
[color=#000000]3.[/color]Dagger Of Sotha Sil - [i]Shock damage [/i][/font]

[size=4][b][i][u]Version 2. 0 - [/u][/i][/b][/size][i]Added for all magic school something individual.[/i]
[size=3]- Shock Magic - Electromagic Rode[/size][i] (an staff which produces very strong sparks)[/i]
[size=3]- Fire Magic - Pyromancer Robes [/size][i](An armor set,enchanted especially for Fire mages)[/i]
[size=3]- Frost Magic - Crygenic Necklace and Ring [/size][i][size=3](an jewelry enchanted especially to fit an Crymancer)[/size]

[b][u][size=4]Version 2.1 -[/size][/u][/b][size=3] Added some new items :         [/size]
[size=3]- Acolyte Of Mara Necklace (Fortify Restoration 30% and Health by 30 pts.)[/size]
[size=3]- Healer Necklace (Fofrtify Restoration 10 pts)[/size]
[size=3]- Nature Luck Necklace (Unecnhanted)[/size]
[size=3]- Akaviri Wreath (One handed increased by 30 pts and health by 10 pts)[/size]
[size=3]- Ra Gada Necklace (unenchanted)[/size]
[size=3]- Tribunal Mask Of Boethiah (unechanted)[/size]
[size=3]- Tribunal Mask Of Azura   (unechanted)[/size]
[size=3]- Goldbrand (fire damage of 20 pts,non-recharge)[/size]
[size=3]- Lantern Of Almalexia (constant mage light effect)[/size]
[size=3]- Paragon Of Dragonblood (3% higher attack damage)[/size]
[size=3]- Bittercup (20 pts to stamina,magicka nad health)[/size]

[/i]
[b]Hope you like it :)[/b]


[i][color=#cc0000]Crediteria :[/color]
[font=Arial][size=3]Insanity for weapon trextures
Runs,Oaristys,Elianora for other textures
ArmoredThirteen for Mara's crescent textures
NewerMind43 for Pyromancers armor
Kearsage for electromagnetic rode
[/size][/font][/i][font=Arial][size=3][i][url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/983976-lautasantenni/]lautasantenni[/url]  for crygenic jewelry
Zairaam and Natterforme for Tribunal masks
Zzjay for necklaces
Gizmodian for lantern and dragon paragon
[/i][/size][/font]
author: ibrica_orahovac
